    It’s very important to keep PhotoSwipe updated, especially during the beta period.

    Each time PhotoSwipe gets an update - GitHub releases page is updated with details about release. Releases page has an Atom feed, you may setup email notifications when feed is updated using IFTTT:

    Altervatively, you can follow @PhotoSwipe on Twitter, or join my tiny email newsletter:

    Get notified about important update or new release.

    Newsletter is sent 3 times a year at max. Powered by Mailchimp.
